title: LDWorkbenchConfiguration
description:
JSON Schema for LDWorkbench.
It helps with the writing of the configuration needed to run LDWorkbench pipelines.

name.description: The name of your pipeline, it must be unique over all your configurations.

description.description: An optional description for your pipeline.

destination.description: The file where the final result of your pipeline is saved.

stages.description: This is where you define the individual iterator/generator for each step.

name.description: The name of your pipeline step, it must be unique within one configuration.

query.description:
Path (prefixed with "file://") or SPARQL Query 
that makes the iterator using SPARQL select.

endpoint.description:
The SPARQL endpoint for the iterator. 
If it starts with "file://", a local RDF file is queried.
If ommmitted the result of the previous file is used.

batchSize.description: Overrule the iterator's behaviour of fetching 10 results per request, regardless of any limit's in your query.

query.description:
Path (prefixed with "file://") or SPARQL Query 
that makes the generator using SPARQL construct.

endpoint.description:
The SPARQL endpoint for the generator. 
If it starts with "file://", a local RDF file is queried.
If ommmitted the endpoint of the Iterator is used.

batchSize.description: Overrule the generator's behaviour of fetching results for 10 bindings of $this per request.

destination.description:
The file where the results are saved. 
This is not a required property, 
if ommitted a temporary file will be created automatically.
